dcterms:description: ERA5 is a global reanalysis dataset that provides hourly data from 1979 to the present, including various atmospheric variables at different pressure levels.
dcterms:title: ERA5

dcterms:description: The ERA5 reanalysis dataset provides hourly data on single levels from 1979 to present, serving as a crucial resource for climate research and weather forecasting.
dcterms:title: ERA5 reanalysis dataset
